main event: An unidentified flying object was observed over Pasadena, California for approximately 2 hours.
interesting points: The object started to slowly descend and then accelerated rapidly upwards and disappeared.
The object was silent and did not emit any light.
The witness reported the incident to an officer, who said it was likely aircraft from Edwards Air Force Base, but could not explain the erratic movements of the object.
The witness estimated the object was about 46 feet in diameter and 3 to 5 miles away.
The witness had not reported the incident earlier because they were unsure of what they had seen, but felt it should be recorded.
